title: The Inception
body: Danny Cole and the Creature World was born. Read more about the origins of the wonderful place the Creatures call home {here}.

title: The First Journey - Ascension
body: 10,000 digital Creature artworks were released into the world and claimed by venturing into the first virtual Creature World. Each artwork is a unique portrait of a Creature, and serves as a ticket to participate in Creature World experiences we call “Journeys.”

title: The Playground
body: A puzzle powered by teamwork: Every Creature holder was sent an artwork that was 1 of 7 parts. By combining your piece with the 6 missing ones held by your peers, you got both a digital and physical artwork of a playground inhabited by 7 creatures, commemorating and immortalizing the reward of togetherness.

title: Creature Playground NYC (with OpenSea)
body: An 80 foot inflatable Creature World bouncy house adventure course — attendees raced through the Creature World with friends at The Hammerstein Ballroom in NYC.

title: The Second Journey - The Creature Finds Its Voice
body: Our second visitation to The Creature World: You wake up in the clouds. A Creature engulfed in a suit of clouds approaches you and tries to speak, but you struggle to respond as you’ve never used your voice before. Your new friend understands and brings you to explore the different ways Creatures can use their voices. Upon discovering your voice, your Creature gets a new mouth to match.

title: Creature World Clothing Line (with Advisry)
body: Wearable art, made with friends, made with love.

title: Creature Holder Exclusive Varsity Jacket
body: An everyday wear and a conversation starter made exclusively for our family.

title: The Creature World docu-series
body: Welcome to the inside of Creature World. Powered by care, resilience, and love. To be 21 in New York during a pandemic and giving your all with your best friends.

title: Creature’s Voice… Claim
body: Well… I finally hear your voice and think I might know a thing or two about you now. Thanks for speaking up. I think I might have something for you…
